name: simple-webrtc-element
description: Simple Webrtc Html Video Element Manager

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Dario Caruso
